DataElement.preferredDefinition: The time of measurement represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A findings domain for assessments that determine whether a therapy induced an immune response._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard._The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the time of the skin
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the time of the skin response measurement?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record time of measurement (as complete as possible).

ReferenceDocuments.name: SRDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable SRDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The time of measurement (if required) can be determined from a collected time of the visit (VISTIM) and in such cases a separate measurement date field is not required.
